metadata.title: Helium Measurements in the North Pacific Ocean along 152°W (PMEL)

creators.name: Atmospheric Research (OAR), Pacific Marine Environmental Laboratory (PMEL), Vents Program

metadata.description: Deep helium measurements for CGC-91 section (also named WOCE P1) along 152°W.  Hydrothermal activity produces a helium plume which can be traced for thousands of kilometers.
metadata.notes:
Purpose: To trace helium plume produced by hydrothermal activity.

Status: In Progress

Maintenance frequency: Unknown

Access constraints: None

Use constraints: None
